      • doExercise

        @RequestMapping(value="/exercises/student/do",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<it.colletta.model.SolutionModel> doExercise(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       it.colletta.model.helper.CorrectionHelper correctionHelper)
        Parameters:
        token - the unique token of the user, in this case a student
        correctionHelper - contains the unique id of the exercise and the solution that was written by the student
        Returns:
        the teacher solution of the exercise.

      • getCorrection

        @RequestMapping(value="/exercises/automatic-solution",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<it.colletta.model.SolutionModel> getCorrection(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> stringObj,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String studentToken)
        Parameters:
        stringObj - the text which has to be analyzed by freeling as map
        studentToken - the unique token of the user
        Returns:
        A SolutionModel with the analyzed sentence or empty if the service is unavailable.
